mapper.select: call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_resource_member_time(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_resource_member_time(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_resource_member_data_list(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_resource_member_pay_list(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_resource_member_use_list(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.sql:
select ifnull(base.mem_no,withdrawal.mem_no) as memNo , ifnull(base.mem_nick,withdrawal.mem_nick) as memNick , ifnull(base.mem_sex,withdrawal.mem_sex) as memSex , ifnull(base.mem_birth_year,withdrawal.mem_birth_year) as memBirthYear , ifnull(base.inner,withdrawal.inner) as `inner` , ROUND(pay_amt) as payAmt , a.dal_cnt as payDalCnt , a.pay_way as payWay , concat(a.pay_ok_date,' ',a.pay_ok_time) as payDate , cancel_dt as cancelDt From rd_data.tb_payment_succ a
select ifnull(base.mem_no,withdrawal.mem_no) as memNo , ifnull(base.mem_nick,withdrawal.mem_nick) as memNick , ifnull(base.mem_sex,withdrawal.mem_sex) as memSex , ifnull(base.mem_birth_year,withdrawal.mem_birth_year) as memBirthYear , ifnull(base.inner,withdrawal.inner) as `inner` , b.gold as byeolCnt , a.last_upd_date as lastUpdDate
, a.ruby + a.money as dalCnt , a.ruby_old + a.money_old as dalOldCnt , a.ruby_new + a.money_new as dalNewCnt
, a.ruby + a.money as dalCnt
, '가입보상' as rewardType
, '레벨보상' as rewardType
, '랭킹보상' as rewardType
, '출석이벤트' as rewardType
, '소실금액 복구' as rewardType
, '(자동) 이벤트 지급' as rewardType
, '(운영자) 이벤트 지급' as rewardType
, '직원테스트(지급)' as rewardType
, '직원테스트(회수)' as rewardType
, '룰렛 이벤트' as rewardType
, '스패셜DJ 혜택' as rewardType
from rd_data.tb_member_wallet_ruby a left join rd_data.tb_member_wallet_gold b on a.mem_no = b.mem_no and a.last_upd_date = b.last_upd_date
left join rd_data.tb_member_basic base on a.mem_no = base.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak withdrawal on a.mem_no = withdrawal.mem_no ,(select @rownum := #{pageStart}) r
where a.pay_yn='y' and a.pay_ok_date >= #{sDate} and a.pay_ok_date <= #{eDate}
where a.cancel_state='y' and date_format(a.cancel_dt,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(a.cancel_dt,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
where a.type in ('6','31') and b.type in ('1','31')
where a.type='15' and ruby + money > 0
where a.type='10'
where a.type='16'
where a.type='11'
where a.type='12'
where a.type='7'
where a.type='23'
where a.type='22'
where a.type='13' and ruby + money > 0
where a.type='13' and ruby + money < 0
where a.type='18' and ruby + money > 0
and date_format(a.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(a.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
and ( (base.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or base.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) or (withdrawal.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or withdrawal.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')))
and ifnull(base.mem_sex,withdrawal.mem_sex) = #{gender} and ifnull(base.inner,withdrawal.inner) = 0
and ifnull(base.inner,withdrawal.inner) = 1
order by payDate desc
order by cancelDt desc
order by lastUpdDate desc

select ifnull(b.mem_no,c.mem_no) as memNo ,ifnull(b.mem_nick,c.mem_nick) as memNick ,ifnull(b.mem_sex,c.mem_sex) as memSex ,ifnull(b.mem_birth_year,c.mem_birth_year) as memBirthYear ,ifnull(b.inner,c.inner) as `inner` ,ifnull(d.mem_no,e.mem_no) as recvMemNo ,ifnull(d.mem_nick,e.mem_nick) as recvMemNick ,ifnull(d.mem_sex,e.mem_sex) as recvMemSex ,ifnull(d.mem_birth_year,e.mem_birth_year) as recvMemBirthYear ,ifnull(d.inner,e.inner) as recvInner
, 'https://image.dalbitlive.com/ani/thumbs/moon_thumb.jpg' as webpImage , 'https://image.dalbitlive.com/ani/thumbs/moon_thumb.jpg' as itemThumbnail , '달 직접선물' as itemName , a.ruby * 100 as dalAmtCnt
, f.webp_image as webpImage , f.item_thumbnail as itemThumbnail , f.item_name as itemName
, a.ruby as dalCnt , a.secret , a.last_upd_date as lastUpdDate , a.item_cnt as itemCnt from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item a left join rd_data.tb_member_basic b on a.mem_no = b.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak c on a.mem_no = c.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_basic d on a.gifted_mem_no = d.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak e on a.gifted_mem_no = e.mem_no left join rd_data.tbl_gift_item f on a.item_code = f.item_code ,(select @rownum := #{pageStart}) r where date_format(a.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(a.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
and a.item_type = '3'
and a.item_type not in ('3','4','5','9')
and ifnull(d.mem_sex,e.mem_sex) = #{gender}
and ifnull(b.mem_sex,c.mem_sex) = #{gender}
and ifnull(b.inner,c.inner) = 0
and ifnull(b.inner,c.inner) = 1
and ( (b.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or b.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) or (c.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or c.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) or (d.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or d.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) or (e.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or e.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) )
order by lastUpdDate desc

select a.mem_no as memNo ,a.mem_nick as memNick ,a.mem_sex as memSex ,a.mem_birth_year as memBirthYear ,a.inner as `inner` ,a.last_upd_date as lastUpdDate ,well.ruby as dalCnt ,well.gold as byeolCnt
,'영구정지' as memState
,'탈퇴' as memState
from rd_data.tb_member_basic a
from rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak a
left join rd_data.tb_member_wallet well on a.mem_no = well.mem_no ,(select @rownum := #{pageStart}) r where date_format(a.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(a.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
and a.mem_state='5'
and a.mem_sex = #{gender} and a.inner = 0
and a.inner = 1
and well.ruby > 0
and well.gold > 0
and (a.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or a.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%'))
order by lastUpdDate desc

select ifnull(base.mem_no,withdrawal.mem_no) as memNo , ifnull(base.mem_nick,withdrawal.mem_nick) as memNick , ifnull(base.mem_sex,withdrawal.mem_sex) as memSex , ifnull(base.mem_birth_year,withdrawal.mem_birth_year) as memBirthYear , ifnull(base.inner,withdrawal.inner) as `inner`
, '레벨보상' as rewardType
, '이벤트 지급(자동)' as rewardType
, '이벤트 지급(운영자 지급)' as rewardType
, '소실금액 복구' as rewardType
, '테스트지급' as rewardType
, '테스트회수' as rewardType
, byeol as byeolCnt ,(select count(*) from rd_data.tb_member_exchange where state = 1 and mem_no= b.mem_no) as exchagneCnt , op_date lastUpdDate
, b.last_upd_date as lastUpdDate , b.gold as byeolCnt
, b.gold_new as newByeolCnt
from rd_data.tb_member_wallet_gold b
from rd_data.tb_member_exchange b
left join rd_data.tb_member_basic base on b.mem_no = base.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak withdrawal on b.mem_no = withdrawal.mem_no ,(select @rownum := #{pageStart}) r
where b.type='5'
where b.type='4' and gold > 0
where b.type='23'
where b.type='6' and gold > 0
where b.type='7' and gold > 0
where (b.type='7' or b.type='6') and gold < 0
where b.type in ('1' , '31')
and date_format(b.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(b.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
where (state = '2' and date_format(b.op_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(b.op_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}) or (state = 4 and date_format(b.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(b.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} )
where state = '1' and date_format(b.op_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(b.op_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate}
and ( (base.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or base.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) or (withdrawal.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or withdrawal.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')))
and ifnull(base.mem_sex,withdrawal.mem_sex) = #{gender} and ifnull(base.inner,withdrawal.inner) = 0
and ifnull(base.inner,withdrawal.inner) = 1
order by lastUpdDate desc

select ifnull(b.mem_no,c.mem_no) as memNo ,ifnull(b.mem_nick,c.mem_nick) as memNick ,ifnull(b.mem_sex,c.mem_sex) as memSex ,ifnull(b.mem_birth_year,c.mem_birth_year) as memBirthYear ,ifnull(b.inner,c.inner) as `inner` ,ifnull(d.mem_no,e.mem_no) as recvMemNo ,ifnull(d.mem_nick,e.mem_nick) as recvMemNick ,ifnull(d.mem_sex,e.mem_sex) as recvMemSex ,ifnull(d.mem_birth_year,e.mem_birth_year) as recvMemBirthYear ,ifnull(d.inner,e.inner) as recvInner , f.webp_image as webpImage , f.item_thumbnail as itemThumbnail , f.item_name as itemName , a.gold as ByeolCnt , a.secret , a.last_upd_date as lastUpdDate , a.item_cnt as itemCnt from rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item a left join rd_data.tb_member_basic b on a.mem_no = b.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak c on a.mem_no = c.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_basic d on a.gifted_mem_no = d.mem_no left join rd_data.tb_member_withdrawal_bak e on a.gifted_mem_no = e.mem_no left join rd_data.tbl_gift_item f on a.item_code = f.item_code ,(select @rownum := #{pageStart}) r where date_format(a.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') >= #{sDate} and date_format(a.last_upd_date,'%Y.%m.%d') <= #{eDate} and a.item_type not in ('3','4','5')
and ifnull(b.mem_sex,c.mem_sex) = #{gender} and ifnull(b.inner,c.inner) = 0
and ifnull(b.inner,c.inner) = 1
and ( (b.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or b.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) or (c.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or c.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) or (d.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or d.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) or (e.mem_no like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') or e.mem_nick like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')) )
order by lastUpdDate desc
